title: Mendel: father of genetics
brief_description: This film clearly demonstrates Mendel’s theory, which shows that characteristics are inherited according to a mathematical pattern having dominant and recessive strains, rather than through inheritance of acquired characteristics or blending of characteristics. Suitable for upper secondary levels.
